description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Houston, United States. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Contemporary Houston Uptown Escape Near The Galleria with Serene Spa, Whiskey Lounge & Nightclub
hotels.description: Feel the warmth of Southern hospitality in the heart of Houston's prestigious Uptown district with a stay at this contemporary resort-style escape. This grand hotel is moments from The Galleria, Houston's premier shopping destination, and offers easy access to the city's diverse culinary scene. Retreat to the tranquil Mokara Spa, sip Texan drams in the whiskey lounge or socialise at the onsite Black Swan Nightclub. For a touch of nature, the hotel's two sparkling pools and tranquil, tree-lined pathways offer a serene oasis amidst the city's hustle and bustle.

hotels.title: Refined Houston Escape with Onsite Mediterranean Restaurant & Outdoor Pool Terrace
hotels.description: Step into a world of refined luxury and heartfelt hospitality with a stay at the InterContinental Houston, an IHG Hotel. This elegant hotel is brimming with sophisticated design and modern amenities, including the Safina Mediterranean restaurant serving classic Mediterranean flavours, and a tranquil outdoor pool terrace surrounded by lounge chairs made for lazy afternoons. Head out to explore the best of Houston, with the downtown and museum districts just a 20-minute drive away.

hotels.vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Houston Med Ctr - Galleria Area
hotels.title: Cosy Downtown Houston Hotel Near The Galleria with Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: Enjoy a comfortable stay in Texas at Crowne Plaza Houston Med Ctr-Galleria Area, an IHG Hotel. After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's outdoor pool or dine on Southern comfort food at 2712 Bistro And Bar, the onsite restaurant. For a taste of Houston's nightlife, head to the nearby Rice Village, a historic shopping district brimming with trendy bars and eateries.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Uptown Houston Stay with Three Onsite Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Discover Houston at Royal Sonesta Houston Galleria, a sophisticated hotel located just a stone’s throw from the city’s most popular sights. Found in the heart of Houston’s glamorous uptown, the hotel is surrounded by bars and restaurants and within walking distance of The Galleria mall. If you’d rather relax in your contemporary accommodation than wander through the city, head to one of the three onsite eateries, including the swanky Axis Lounge, serving up ‘liquid art’ in the form of handcrafted cocktails paired with a menu of small plates. To keep active during your time away, visit the modern fitness centre or take advantage of the complimentary shuttle, which will transport you to points of interest within five kilometres of the hotel.
